abstract: Samsung Electronics reportedly planned to introduce a wristwatch in September that can make phone calls, play video games and send e-mails, potentially beating Apple to market.
snippet: Samsung Electronics reportedly planned to introduce a wristwatch in September that can make phone calls, play video games and send e-mails, potentially beating Apple to market.
lead_paragraph: Samsung Electronics plans to introduce a wristwatch in September that can make phone calls, play video games and send e-mails, potentially beating Apple to market with a piece of technology that moves mobile communications beyond the smartphone.

headline.main: Samsung Said to Be Preparing to Unveil Smart Watch
headline.print_headline: Samsung Set to Unveil a Smart Watch
